description: Try our easy to follow Mexican Beef Burrito recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Burrito,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Healthier Easier,Low sugar,Sesame free,Beef,Fakeaway,High protein,High fibre,Tomato,Easter,Peanut free
name: Mexican Beef Burrito Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 370g Woolworths The Cook's Cuts beef flank steak
80g Woolworths no-added salt black beans, rinsed, drained

recipeInstructions.text: Place 1 tbs oil, cumin, oregano, paprika, chilli and garlic in a glass or ceramic dish. Add steak and turn to coat. Refrigerate for at least 30 minutes to marinate.

Meanwhile, place lettuce, cheese, capsicum, avocado and half the coriander into separate bowls. Combine tomato, onion, beans, lime juice and remaining coriander in another bowl. Mix well and set aside.
Warm tortillas according to packet instructions.
Serve tortillas, fillings and bean salsa and let everyone serve themselves.
